title: AI will reinvent local news
description: In 2026, I sense something unusual is happening: two seemingly unrelated trends are converging in ways that could remake the field from both above and within. Part 1: AI will try to save local news because it has no other choice To state the obvious: AI models can only remain accurate if they ingest a...
